RelatedSentence: A major hydro - electric dam project in Ethiopia will help provide the region with much - needed energy and income , but could have serious implications for tribes living in the area .
The BBC 's Peter Greste travelled to the site of the latest part of the project - the still-to-be-completed Gibe III dam - and met some of the tribes living downstream .
